name: reminder
message: The first stop Staff Residence 2 of these 3 routes will not be operated until 15 September 2017.
Departure time of the campus shuttle bus may be adjusted as needed. Buses will depart as soon as they are full. Frequency will increase during peak hours.
The shuttle bus will operate according to the route and time-table. Passengers shall not request for ad hoc stops or changes of the bus routes.
Buses run in loop and all buses depart from Staff Residence 2.
Please place large size luggage in the luggage compartment of campus shuttle bus.
